text: (phir ham poochhenge ki kyon) ai giroh jin va ins kya tumhaare paas tum hee mein ke paigambar nahin aae jo tum tumase hamaaree aayaten bayaan karen aur tumhen tumhaare us roz (qayaamat) ke pesh aane se daraen vah sab arj karenge (beshak aae the) ham khud apane oopar aap apane (khilaaph) gavaahee dete hain (vaakee) unako duniya kee (chand roz) zindagee ne unhen andhere mein daal rakha aur un logon ne apane khilaaph aap gavaahee deen
